pages.text: $(1)I was seeking to isolate a cheaper source of Mind power than $(item)Enchanted Books$(1) when I decided to attempt to dissolve a simple $(item)Book and Quill$(1) into a solution of Mind. $(p)The result was not what I expected. There must be some way to harness this property...
$(1)Consulting the texts, I find theories about information density and diffusion. Perhaps the amount of Mind power has something to do with what happens?
